title: yogg

content: Welcome to this auction for three Coldkey sets ! Lot #1 : 4 Gold 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #2Lot #2 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #6 Lot #3 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #7 Lot #1 : 4 Gold 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #2+ 1 set of matching Coldkey NFTs  (Thread to be shortly updated with NFTs)Lot #2 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #6 Lot #3 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #7 (Actual pictures are from set #6)+ 1 set of matching Coldkey NFTs  (Thread to be shortly updated with NFTs)End date : Â  Wednesday, 25st May 2022, 21:59:59 Paris time (Countdown timer)Starting bids : Â Lot #1 : 0.005BTCLot #2 : 0.005BTCLot #3 : 0.005BTC Bid increments : 0.0005BTCAny bid in the last 10 mn extends the bidding period with a full additional 10mn.(ie. if there is a bid at 21:55, auction ends at 22:09:59, at the end of the full extended period)Free regular tracked shipping worldwide from France. Different (paid) shipping options available if needed.Payment to : >> bc1qjl6a9entztv9lg6kv059da5my760s4a4f7468j << Reputable escrows are more than welcome to help with a transaction. (Buyer pays fees)We (Yogg or Owlcatz) reserve the right to refuse a bid from any user, or ask for a deposit to confirm the bid, without justification.Happy bidding to everyone !
